column1: neuoe rwala diete tsena hantle ketlomoshapa atopola tjee
he ha kesomoutlwe ngwanana yarobalang motsehare
mme manyeo u ngwanana ya botswa
wena jwale ha usabatla honka dintho hobapala
ke eng ha boroko boutswara hoseng hakalekale
neuoe tloha monyako skanna etsa tjena dintho tseno utladidiha tlisa ka nqena
ha hothwe banebale kae hothwe banebale bakae
ka matso ka mamao amangata hakale uankile kae
